casebody.data:
KUPLEN
v.
Thomas BECK, et al. No. 602P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 6, 2008. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Beck, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of December 2007 by Plaintiff for "Application to Suspend or Vary the North Carolina Rules of Appellate Procedure or Alternatively Appoint Legal Counsel":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of March 2008."
